title: UPDATE: 10-year-old boy shot in the head
content:
UPDATE: As of noon on Saturday the child's condition remains critical. No arrests have been made in this incident and police believe the shooting was accidental.
A 10-year-old Shreveport boy was shot in the head Friday evening, according to Shreveport Police Department.
The incident happened around 7 p.m. on the 200 block of Prospect Street.
According to SPD spokesperson Cpl. Marcus Hines, police aren't sure exactly what happened, but are talking with family who were home, including one parent, at the time to find out.
The child was taken to University Health Shreveport with life-threatening injuries.
The Times will continue to update this story as more information becomes available.
